data.actual_result: The text of the draft is still there, but all files that were attached to your message are gone
data.expected_result: Your message draft should be left intact
data.short_description: If you change your language on Desktop while you have a message draft saved on Android, the draft will lose all files attached to it
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable Sync across clients in Language settings - In a text channel, write something in the textbox, select some files to attach and keep the message in your drafts (i.e don't send the message) - Change your language using the Desktop client - Wait for the new language to apply on Android
